content:
# Now that I have gathered 10 stone along with the 10 coal, I can proceed to craft the stone furnace.
# I will attempt to craft the stone furnace again now that I have the required materials.

craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Craft one stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory after crafting the stone furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory again.
